name: Paper & Boi: Inseparable Pals
description:
YOU CAN PET THE DOG

Think - "What if Untitled Good Game was about a boy and his dog?" and you'll be close

Stealthy Puzzler

Story:

“I can't wait to play this game!

I don't want to wait...!!

BOi, let's go get it!”

“Arf..!”

Off they went. To Big Boom Corp to get the SECRET UNRELEASED copy..!

The boy named Paper and his bestest friend in the whole wide world, a puppy called BOi, did everything together. They where a great team. BOi was the best assistant when Paper had a plan, he was a good puppy. Except when there was snacks, especially raffles. BOi loves those.

And so they found themselves in front of the big office building, ready for action!

“You distract them, BOi, ok?”

“ArfArf..!”

“And I will get the super secret copy and be the first in the whole wide world to play the game!”

It wont be easy, there are many obstacles, and they cant get caught!

BOi has his undercover bunny costume on, so they wont even know it's him.

“But I cant be seen, ok BOi?"

"Arrrf..!"

Good Boy!

Oki, Let's go..!!”

TEAM: International Strangers

Guile - Programmer

Lucas "Yellowpaper" - Programmer

Michael Pilatzkie - Game Designer, Level Designer, Team Lead

Josie - Art Director, Animator, 3D Artist

Ghabriel Frattari - 2D Artist
